description: First occurrence of n as a term in the continued fraction for zeta(3).
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Apery's Constant Continued Fraction
mathematica: With[{cfz3 = ContinuedFraction[Zeta[3], 6000]}, Flatten[Table[Position[cfz3, n, 1, 1], {n, 60}]]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Nov 11 2012 *)
prog: (PARI) (1500 precision digits) v=contfrac(zeta(3)); a(n)=if(n<0,0,s=1; while(abs(n-component(v,s))>0,s++); s)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from Randall L. Rathbun (randallr(AT)abac.com), Feb 03 2002
